summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 54E, Page 137 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 50, Boston Company's Plat of West Seattle from RD 5000 and BC to RMV 150, and accepting a Property Use and Development agreement in connection therewith. (C.F. 285627, Petition of Thomas Harader).
